special_abilities.name: Insatiable Greed
special_abilities.desc: The abhorrent overlord can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The abhorrent overlord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The abhorrent overlord makes two attacks with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. The abhorrent overlord regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt if the target is a creature.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description:
The abhorrent overlord conjures a swarm of spectral crows and harpies in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the overlord can see within 120 feet of it. The sphere remains for 1 minute or until the overlord loses concentration (as if concentrating on a spell), and its area is lightly obscured and difficult terrain.
Any creature that moves into the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a 15 Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 16 (3d10) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Storm of Crows (Recharge 6)

special_abilities.name: Hide in Plain Sight
special_abilities.desc: The alseid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide while it is in grassland.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The alseid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The alseid makes two radiant touch attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) radiant damage.
actions.name: Radiant Touch

name: Anvilwrought Raptor
subtitle: Tiny construct, unaligned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Recorded Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.description: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Aphemia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Aphemia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: Aphemia makes two attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Aphemia shrieks a cacophony of magical sounds. Each humanoid within 120 feet of her must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her until the song ends. A frightened creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage at the start of its turn while Aphemia is singing. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Aphemia's Discordant Song for the next 24 hours. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is incapacitated or dies.
actions.name: Discordant Song

actions.description: Aphemia intones a low, growling magical melody. Every undead within 300 feet of her must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or fall under her control until the song ends. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing, and she can mentally command the undead under her control as part of the same bonus action. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is incapacitated or dies.
actions.name: Grave Calling Song

special_abilities.name: Armor of Spiders (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If Arasta is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, she regains 200 hit points. In addition, Arasta's children immediately swarm over her body to protect her, granting her 100 temporary hit points.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Arasta fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Arasta has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Arasta can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: Arasta ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.description: Arasta makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage, and the target must make a 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Arasta unleashes her hair in the form of webbing that fills a 30-foot cube next to her. The web is difficult terrain, its area is lightly obscured, and it lasts for 1 minute. Any creature that moves into the web or that starts its turn there must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is restrained while in the web. A creature can use an action to make a 21 Strength check. On a success, it can free itself or a creature within 5 feet of it that is restrained by the web. This webbing is immune to all damage except magical fire. A 5-foot cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 20 fire damage from a spell or other magical source on a single turn.
actions.name: Web of Hair (Recharge 4-6)

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Mount
special_abilities.desc: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

special_abilities.name: Radiant Rebirth (Recharges after a Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points, it regains 30 hit points and springs back to its feet with a burst of radiance. Each creature of the archon's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw, or the creature takes 13 (3d8) radiant damage and is blinded until the start of the archon's turn.

actions.description: The archon makes two attacks with its radiant spear.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.
actions.name: Radiant Spear

special_abilities.name: Aura of Silence
special_abilities.desc: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a 18 Wisdom saving throw if the rider can see it. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature can't speak and is deafened until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Mount
special_abilities.desc:
If the ashen rider isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the ashen rider and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the ashen rider appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.
While mounted and not incapacitated, the ashen rider can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the ashen rider is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

actions.description: The ashen rider makes three attacks with its ashen blade or two attacks with its bolt of ash.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.
actions.name: Ashen Blade

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the ashen rider's next turn.
actions.name: Bolt of Ash

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The harpy has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: The harpy has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.description: The harpy makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

name: Bronze Sable
subtitle: Medium construct, unaligned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the sable remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The sable has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sable's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Surprise Attack
special_abilities.desc: If the sable surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

actions.description: The sable makes two bite attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

name: Colossus of Akros
subtitle: Gargantuan construct, unaligned
languages: understands Common and Celestial but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Crumbling Destruction
special_abilities.desc: When the colossus drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue must make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage and 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Fire Absorption
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the colossus is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The colossus's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.description: The colossus of Akros makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., or range 200/600 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage, or 27 (4d8 + 9) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the colossus makes a ranged attack with this spear, the spear magically returns to its hand after the attack.
actions.name: Spear

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (6d8 + 9) slashing damage.
actions.name: Sword

actions.description: Magical flames issue from the colossus toward up to three creatures the colossus can see within 90 feet of it. Each target must make a 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a target also magically catches fire for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the burning target repeats the saving throw. It takes 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, and the effect ends on a successful one.
actions.name: Flames of Akros (Recharge 6)

special_abilities.name: Aura of Erebos
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the giant must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw, or it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the giant's Aura of Erebos for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The giant makes two slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The giant exhales a mighty gust that creates a blast of deadly mist in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.
actions.name: Noxious Gust (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Insatiable Greed
special_abilities.desc: The eater of hope can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The eater of hope has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The eater of hope makes two attacks with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: The eater of hope exhales a miasma of Underworld winds in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and is cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target takes an extra 6 (1d12) necrotic damage whenever the eater of hope hits it with an attack. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't cursed.
actions.name: Breath of Hopelessness (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Running Leap
special_abilities.desc: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

special_abilities.name: Spell Turning
special_abilities.desc: The lion has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the lion (not an area). If the lion's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the lion and instead targets the caster.

actions.description: The lion makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

name: Ghostblade Eidolon
subtitle: Medium undead, unaligned
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Blurred Form
special_abilities.desc: Attack rolls against the eidolon are made with disadvantage unless the eidolon is incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.description: The eidolon makes two ghostblade attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.
actions.name: Ghostblade

name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
subtitle: Large construct, unaligned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the sentinel moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Spell Turning
special_abilities.desc: The sentinel has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the sentinel (not an area). If the sentinel's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the sentinel and instead targets the caster.

actions.description: The sentinel makes two ram attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Ram

actions.description: The sentinel exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The hippocamp can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the hippocamp moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Hooves

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Ram

special_abilities.name: Reactive
special_abilities.desc: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

special_abilities.name: Vigilant
special_abilities.desc: The giant can't be surprised.

actions.description: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Rock

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Hythonia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that can see Hythonia's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, Hythonia can force it to make a 18 Constitution saving throw if she isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, on a failed save the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Hythonia until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Hythonia in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If Hythonia sees herself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of her and in an area of bright light, she is affected by her own gaze.

special_abilities.name: Shed Skin (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If Hythonia is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, she sheds her skin, regains 199 hit points, and moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.description: Hythonia makes three attacks: one with her claws, one to constrict, and one with her snaky hair.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Hythonia can't constrict another target.
actions.name: Constrict

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and Hythonia can pull the target up to 5 feet closer to her if it is a Large or smaller creature.
actions.name: Snaky Hair

special_abilities.name: Acidic Blood
special_abilities.desc: When the hydra takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of the hydra takes 9 (2d8) acid damage.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

special_abilities.name: Multiple Heads
special_abilities.desc: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious. Whenever the hydra takes 35 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

special_abilities.name: Reactive Heads
special_abilities.desc: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: Wakeful
special_abilities.desc: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

actions.description: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Corpse Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once on its turn, the lampad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one creature's corpse within its reach and emerge from a second creature's corpse within 60 feet of the first corpse, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second corpse. Both corpses must be Medium or bigger.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The lampad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The lampad attacks twice with its necrotic touch or chill touch.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Necrotic Touch

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the lampad's next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the lampad until the end of the lampad's next turn.
actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If the leonin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: While the leonin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.description: The leonin makes three weapon attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The naiad can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Invisible in Water
special_abilities.desc: The naiad is invisible while fully immersed in water.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The naiad makes two psychic touch attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) psychic damage.
actions.name: Psychic Touch

special_abilities.name: Aura of Nightmares
special_abilities.desc: Undead creatures within 30 feet of the shepherd gain a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls. When any other creature that isn't undead or a construct starts its turn within 30 feet of the shepherd, that creature must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The shepherd has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The shepherd makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its staff.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 26 (4d12) psychic damage.
actions.name: Staff

actions.description: The shepherd pulls twisted souls from the Underworld; 1d6 shadows (without Sunlight Weakness; see the Monster Manual) arise in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the shepherd. The shadows act right after the shepherd on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the shepherd dies.
actions.name: Herd the Underworld (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the ram moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Sure-Footed
special_abilities.desc: The ram has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.
actions.name: Ram

special_abilities.name: Blessings of the Gods
special_abilities.desc: While the oracle is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier. In addition, a creature that hits the oracle with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) force damage.

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage.
actions.name: Eldritch Touch

special_abilities.name: Invisible in Fire
special_abilities.desc: The oread is invisible while fully immersed in fire.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The oread has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The oread attacks twice with its fiery touch or fire bolt.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) fire damage.
actions.name: Fiery Touch

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage.
actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)

special_abilities.name: Gatekeeper's Aura
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the phylaskia must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the phylaskia to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the phylaskia drops to 1 hit point instead.

special_abilities.name: Vigilant
special_abilities.desc: The phylaskia can't be surprised.

actions.description: The phylaskia makes two longsword attacks and uses its Strength Drain once.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, its Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
actions.name: Strength Drain

special_abilities.name: Enthralling Performance
special_abilities.desc: If the satyr performs for at least 1 minute, it chooses up to four humanoids within 60 feet of it who watched or listened to the entire performance. Each target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed. While charmed in this way, the target idolizes the satyr and will take part in the satyr's revels. The charmed condition ends for the creature after 1 hour, if it takes any damage, if the satyr attacks the target, or if the target witnesses the satyr attacking or damaging any of the target's allies.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Sleepless Reveler
special_abilities.desc: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

actions.description: The satyr makes two ram attacks or two shortbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Ram

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Sleepless Reveler
special_abilities.desc: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

actions.description: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Ram

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

actions.description: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

special_abilities.name: Spell Turning
special_abilities.desc: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

actions.description: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Head

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The chimera exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The triton can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons 1d4 water weirds (see the Monster Manual). The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within 60 feet of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

actions.description: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) cold damage.
actions.name: Wave Touch

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the triton's next turn.
actions.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The triton can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.description: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
actions.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Poisoned Spine

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Tromokratis can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If Tromokratis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Tromokratis's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Tromokratis deals double damage to objects and structures.

special_abilities.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
special_abilities.desc: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.description: Tromokratis makes three attacks: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 26). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.
actions.name: Pincer

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 26). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target up to 60 feet in a straight line. The target lands prone and takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tentacle Grasp

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Bite

special_abilities.name: Aggressive
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

special_abilities.name: Multiheaded
special_abilities.desc: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The cerberus exhales a 15-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a 12 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.
actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.description: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Bites, one to constrict, and one with its maw.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 35 (8d6 + 7) piercing damage.
actions.name: Flurry of Bites

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.
actions.name: Constrict

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) acid damage.
actions.name: Maw

name: Underworld Cerberus
subtitle: Large monstrosity, lawful evil
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Aggressive
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

special_abilities.name: Multiheaded
special_abilities.desc: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.description: The cerberus makes three bite attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The cerberus exhales a 30-foot cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a 15 Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 20 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.
actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
